taxonomy.title: Filter by Taxonomy
taxonomy.description: Search and select a taxon to see its details

tree.title: Taxonomy Explorer
tree.description: The Taxonomic Tree Explorer lets you navigate taxonomy with a D3 Hyperbolic Tree. Zoom with the mouse wheel or trackpad, pan by dragging, and click nodes to view details. Explore seamlessly for a dynamic view of the tree of life.

taxon.searchPlaceholder: Search a taxon by name or taxid

genomeBrowser.title: Genome Browser
genomeBrowser.description: Select an assembly to view in the genome browser

assemblies.title: Add New Genome Browser Session
assemblies.placeholder: Search by species or assembly name
assemblies.noOptions: No assemblies match the search criteria

assembly.modelDescription: The page features the JBrowse 2 Linear Genome Viewer (JBrowse 2), an interactive tool for exploring genome sequences and annotations. Users can navigate along the genome, zoom in on specific regions, and, when available, visualize annotations such as genes and features. The browser also allows downloading FASTA sequences for selected regions, enabling further analysis. If annotations are present, users can inspect gene structures, coding regions, and other genomic features in a clear, interactive format.

countries.title: Countries Selection
countries.infoDescription: The countries displayed are determined based on the sample metadata, if contains a 'country' field, or by checking if the geographical coordinates of samples fall within a country's boundaries. Please note that this process may occasionally result in inaccuracies.

filters.title: Filters
filters.modalDescription: Enter a field name to check if it exists in the database. Use dot notation for nested fields, such as
filters.ebpMetricsDescription: Assemblies compliant with the Earth BioGenome Project quality standards

biosample.label: Biosample Submitted
biosample.description: At least one INSDC BioSample is linked to this organisms

experiment.label: Reads Submitted
experiment.description: At least one INSDC Experiment is linked to a BioSample related to this organism

assembly.label: Assemblies Submitted
assembly.description: At least one INSDC Assembly is linked to a BioSample related to this organism

collected.label: Sample Collected
collected.description: A sample for the species has been collected by field workers but has not yet been sent to a sequencing center

acquired.label: Sample Acquired
acquired.description: A sample for the species has been acquired and is “in house” at the sequencing centre, but has not been processed yet

generation.label: Data Generation
generation.description: Sequencing data are currently being generated for the species

assembly.label: In Assembly
assembly.description: All sequencing and related data have been collected and genome assembly is in process

submitted.label: INSDC Submitted
submitted.description: The species’ genome assembly has been submitted to INSDC and is openly accessible under the generating project’s Bioproject ID

publication.label: Publication Available
publication.description: Assembly has an associated publication with a DOI or PubMed ID

reportModal.title: Download Report
reportModal.description: Select multiple fields or type a new field, if the field is contained in metadata type: 'metadata.fieldYouWantToSelect'
reportModal.tip: Select TSV or JSONL for faster retrieval
reportModal.queryMessage: Type a field and check if exists

chartModal.title: Create chart
chartModal.description: If the field is part of metadata or is nested, use the format: 'metadata.fieldYouWantToSelect' for top-level fields, or 'metadata.parentField.nestedField' for nested fields.
